content.new:
--observations option continues looking in traindir/observations even after another observations folder is separately specified. 

For example, specifying --observations=traindir_old/observations/ folder results in Segway looking at traindir_old/observ
content.old:
--observations option continues looking in traindir/observations even after another observations folder is separately specified. 

For example, specifying --observations=traindir_old/observations/ folder results in Segway looking at traindir_old/observ

issue.title: --observations option continues looking in traindir even after observations folder is separately specified
